Description of incident: A former employee's laptop was stolen during a home burglary sometime in mid November.  On November 30, the District learned that the former employee's laptop contained confidential records.  Current and former District employees had their names, Social Security numbers and other confidential information exposed.  UPDATE (12/22/2011): It was revealed that a finance director loaded private information onto a personal laptop and took it home to finish work.  Though the finance director's last day with the School District was September 2, 2011, the laptop still contained sensitive data when it was stolen on November 11.
